spaceSeparation.fieldDescription: Value needs to be specified with its absolute or relative length units (%, px, em, rem, pc, etc)..
spaceSeparation.name: ./spaceSeparation

showSeparator.fieldDescription: When checked shows a line separator between columns container
showSeparator.name: ./showSeparator

mobileColumns.fieldDescription: By default, columns are only activated from tablet onwards. This means columns are stacked on top of each other on mobile. Check this box if you want columns to work on mobile too
mobileColumns.name: ./isMobileColumns

verticalCentered.fieldDescription: When checked, the columns align vertically centered
verticalCentered.name: ./isVerticalCentered

horizontalCentered.fieldDescription: When checked, the columns align horizontally centered
horizontalCentered.name: ./isHorizontalCentered

removeGap.fieldDescription: When checked, the space between columns is removed.
removeGap.name: ./isGapless

backgroundSizeM.fieldDescription: Value needs to be specified with its absolute or relative length units (%, px, em, rem, pc, etc).
backgroundSizeM.name: ./backgroundSizeM

backgroundSizeD.fieldDescription: Value needs to be specified with its absolute or relative length units (%, px, em, rem, pc, etc).
backgroundSizeD.name: ./backgroundSizeD

backgroundSizeM.fieldDescription: Value needs to be specified with its absolute or relative length units (%, px, em, rem, pc, etc).
backgroundSizeM.name: ./contentBackgroundSizeM

backgroundSizeD.fieldDescription: Value needs to be specified with its absolute or relative length units (%, px, em, rem, pc, etc).
backgroundSizeD.name: ./contentBackgroundSizeD

applyContentBorderColor.fieldDescription: When checked the options to set a size and color for border will be enable
applyContentBorderColor.name: ./applyContentBorderColor

borderWidth.fieldDescription: Value can be specified with its absolute or relative length units (%, px, em, rem, pc, etc), you can set multiple parameters to define border side.
borderWidth.name: ./borderWidth
